title: Golden Palace — Real Estate & Architecture
hero_subtitle: Luxury Architecture Inspired by City & Sea
about_p1: Founded in 1997, Golden Palace Real Estate has become a trusted name in the real estate industry, known for its commitment to quality, integrity, and stability. Since our establishment, our mission has been not only to sell properties but to deliver value-driven, long-term investment solutions.
about_p2: With decades of experience and a deep understanding of the market, we offer a comprehensive range of services including residential projects, land development, restoration, hotel investments, and legal consultancy. Our team of experts provides professional, transparent, and result-oriented services for both individual and corporate clients.
about_p3: At Golden Palace Real Estate, we believe in being the true guide to smart investments. We carefully analyze our clients’ needs and present the most suitable real estate options while maintaining the highest quality standards. Our projects combine aesthetic appeal, functionality, sustainability, and modern architecture, adding both comfort and long-term value to every living space.
about_p4: Supported by our in-house legal department, we ensure full transparency and legal security at every stage of the investment process. Today, Golden Palace is recognized not only for its real estate consultancy but also for its investment vision and professional project management. Golden Palace Real Estate – Building trust and value since 1997.
about_p5_vision: Vision: To combine our long-standing experience with innovation and digital solutions, strengthening our position as a respected, pioneering, and trustworthy brand both nationally and internationally.
about_p6_mission: Mission: To deliver high-standard, legally secure, and value-oriented real estate solutions that meet the unique expectations of every client.
otel_contact_address_p: Kocakapı Mahallesi, Gaziler Caddesi, No:214 Konak/İzmir, İzmir, Turkey

prop_INSAAT3_desc: The new meeting point of the region, with cinema halls and a gourmet food court.
prop_INSAAT4_desc: A-Class office spaces with sea view and modern technology.
service_p_1: We offer creative and functional solutions, from concept development to implementation projects.
service_p_2: Aesthetic and ergonomic interior solutions that reflect the spirit of your spaces.
service_p_3: We restore historical and cultural heritage structures to their original state, preserving them for the future.
service_p_4: We meticulously manage all processes from project inception to delivery, ensuring on-time completion.
